title: Foundations of Law for Adult Learners: Lecture Recording-Based Educational Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Legal Terminology Understanding and Core Legal Concepts for Daily Life
context.additional_context: Focuses on legal knowledge applicable to the daily lives of general citizens, providing recorded lecture materials for review after offline classes.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three legal issues that may arise during contract formation.
Learners can classify civil obligation violation cases into two types and propose appropriate legal responses.
Learners can analyze dispute cases occurring in daily life and apply relevant legal provisions with 80% accuracy.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
